name: Mangatherer
short_description:
Mangatherer allows people to download and read offline their favorite mangas. It downloads them from  websites (such as www.mangareader.net), and store them locally, so people can read them at any moment.

The program is written in Java, and is currently limited :
    - It can download mangas, but only from one website. We must add a lot of others (from any language)
   - The architecture is not well done (it is a first try only)
   - We would like to add an online read, without local storage
   - We must add bookmarks, it is very useful when you read and when you update your manga

There is a lot of work left, don't hesitate if you want to help ;-)
summary: Mangatherer allows people to download and read mangas offline.
